concept.title: Include notes in transmittal package
concept.shortdesc: The report file is automatically generated while generating transmittal package and saved in the transmittal package together with the files list of the transmittal package as well. Meanwhile, this report includes dependent files associative to the drawing file (such as xrefs, fonts) as well as instructions about how to process these files so as to enable using for included drawing files. The information that user input in the Enter notes to include with this transmittal is also included in the report file.
